title: Awesome!!
text:
Came across SHEIN on Facebook and figured it was another Chinese company that would take months to ship you the wrong stuff. What a pleasant surprise when I got exactly what I ordered in a reasonable amount of time! No, the clothes aren‚Äôt superior quality, but what do you expect when you pay $6 for a shirt? They reward customers to post pictures of the clothes once they receive them, so you get an idea of what the clothes will look like on REAL women, not just models. Really can‚Äôt say enough good things about SHEIN.

Update: I‚Äôve now had an experience with the return process with SHEIN, so wanted to give an update to my review since that was something I was worried about.  Returning something is super easy! They give you a free shipping label, you drop it back into the mail, and you‚Äôre done. 

I‚Äôve been shopping on SHEIN for a couple of years now, and really only have great things to say about this business!

Shein is definetly my go to place for buying clothes now! It does take a few weeks to deliver but it‚Äôs totally worth it they make their stuff in a factory in china I belive and they ship it all the way across the country for you. I also love Shein because there‚Äôs constant coupons available but it‚Äôs not like they price stuff high and give out coupons to make it seem like a good deal, it‚Äôs legit a good deal everything is already so cheap and they go out of their way to make it so much cheaper for you, on my last order it was already extremely cheap and I saved 25 dollars not because of anything I had to sign up for or earn, then just took money off because of how many times I had in my cart! They also basically pay you to leave reviews, they don‚Äôt want fake 5k star reviews though.. they ask for your honest opinion and display it right at the top for everyone to see! I 100% reccomend Shein.

title: LOOK, IF YOU WANT AN HONEST REVIEW JUST READ¬° -_-
text:
SATISFIED. 

‚Ä¢LONG REVIEW‚Ä¢

I have ordered clothing from shein three times and I have to say that the first time buying clothes was a bit unsatisfying. Most of it was me trying my best to find the right sizes. I would recommend looking at reviews and photos from others who have bought before to have a better decision on 
a best size choice. It helps A LOT!! (Especially if you are a small or xtra small fit) Items I bought such as bras and bra-tops were mediocre in material and fabrics but most shirts and crop tops I have purchased were awesome. Basically some clothing is cheaper than others in fabric. Self measurements can be a bit inaccurate with clothing at times maybe because of how the clothes are designed but just go with your gut if wanting to continue shopping. HIGHLY RECOMMEND BEING CAREFUL WHEN LOOKING FOR JEANS OR SHOES!! 

Prices are very low which is awesome for me since I‚Äôm a college student trying to buy inexpensive clothing. The most expensive things I‚Äôve ever encountered on there are the shipping fees (FAST SHIPPING IS LIKE $12 MORE) and shoe prices. 

Overall, I would go with shein being great. And also, if you are into aesthetic trends and fashion like me. Shein provides inexpensive trendy clothing! I think it‚Äôs a good experience for young ladies to try shein and see if it‚Äôs the best shopping place. I personally like it and will continue to shop on there! :)

title: SHEIN 10/10
text: I love SHEIN. Great and easy way to get cute stuff for reasonable prices & for decent quality. You definitely get what you pay for but a lot of their stuff is cute and for the price you can almost never pass it up. I have a lot of fav pieces that have come from SHEIN that I get all kinds of compliments on. Sizes are usually to fitting, if you are a large you should get a large. Shipping is usually pretty okay as far the timely manner in which it comes. I haven‚Äôt ordered anything since COVID has been around. They usually are always willing to give you some sort of coupon and give you ways to earn money to spend by writing reviews on the things you bought. I earned $9.00 in store credit just from talking about the things I‚Äôve bought from there. The APP is really convenient and easy to navigate and is user friendly. Highly recommend.

title: Fell in love back in 2020
text: Everytime i get a new device id connect my account to it and just fall in love over and over again with Shein. Now especially since i can shop and do afterpay. Im not ashame. I just have alot of bulls to pay and cant stop myself from browsing through shein 24/7. I love especially the discounts, coupons, and free shipping. Save alot each time i get things from shein. Its been my main place to shop for me and my other half and my kids. I would day this one deserve all 5 stars. You should start it and you wont regret it. You will fall in love with it. Even the sizes are true. Fit perfectly even when go one size more or lower. It still fits. If bot then you dont need to worry. They have amazing return value. They dont cheat you. They are truly loyal to their words. Try it out. You will thank me later for itü•∞ü•∞happy shopping.‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Puppy keep broken after latest. iOS update.
text:
I love using the SHEIN app to do my orders and I do love playing the mini games however the puppy keep game is not working correctly because it had me restart level 20 OUT OF 25 twice and even though I reported the issue via chat to customer service but no one in customer service did anything about it other than apologize and no one followed up with an email. then to make things worse after the most recent iOS update yesterday now the pop-up section where you can choose your daily clicks or choose to get 4K tokens for placing orders that whole modal/popup section is now unresponsive. It even keeps randomly telling me I‚Äôve completed tasks and then doesn‚Äôt give me any points and then tells me invalid. All of this happened after I had placed two orders to get the tokens and now that was a worthless attempt because it‚Äôs not not working in the app. 

Developers please learn to QA your mobile applications better on different mobile software platforms, and please fix the app with this most recent iOS update.

title: Horrible customer service
text:
I LOVE the stuff from shein, everything is super cute. However recently I tried to place an order and they recognized my master card as maestro, which it isnt. It happened twice now and the first time it happened they helped me very well, I waiting for 5 hrs for them to fix their system then I was able to place my order. It happened AGAIN this morning, and I tried having a live chat with an agent because they dont have any solutions/questions/or anything that was relating ro my problem. I tried contacting one at 12pm and they said all the agents were busy. I tries it every 15-30 mins but its still the same. It is now 4pm and no one has helped me. I need my stuff by next week and the stupid robot just says the same exact thing over and over again. 
PS. Ive been using the same card ever since my first time buying on shein and there was no problem. And there was definitely no problem on My card because my card went through on every other apps/websites.

title: I love it
text: I‚Äôm a bigger girl and my whole life I‚Äôve really struggled being able to find clothes that not only are affordable really cute and I actually flatter my body I do have to say a lot of their clothes in the Plus size to curvy section is actually really nice it‚Äôs pretty decent quality at a really low price compared to like torrid or other stores similar who carries similar things sometimes you‚Äôre going to get the same quality from there I will say however there‚Äôs a couple things that I know I couldn‚Äôt wear is a plus size but I also think that fits probably more until like the Kirby category so when you do first look at that section and if you don‚Äôt see a lot of clothes that you‚Äôre like oh I would work there are definitely close you just have to look you can even put the filters on so you can fine what‚Äôs best for you

title: Everything you could hope for!
text: I thought this would be one of those ‚Äútoo good to be true‚Äù type of apps, and keep in mind I never write reviews...ever. But, SHEIN proved me wrong in EVERY aspect and I felt it deserved some credibility! I have spent close to $300 on this app. My first purchase was over $100 and I was taking a big leap of faith based off the reviews and praying everything came as pictured. It did not disappoint!!! Not only did I get my money‚Äôs worth and got 5-6 outfits for about $100 but I received all my items in a timely manner, within a business week, but I got free shipping, coupons and promos, flash sales, and cheap items that didn‚Äôt give up the quality! Even their knock off earrings didn‚Äôt make my sensitive ears itchy! Worth it! I have replaced almost my entire wardrobe, after having 3 kids, for less than $300. And everything is TRUE TO SIZE! And if it isn‚Äôt, the reviews will tell you so!

title: The fashion house you could always trust ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
text: I‚Äôm always skeptical when it comes to buying online in general, not to mention clothing, bags and shoes. It was not different during my first purchase from SHEIN, and I was only 50% satisfied with the package. This was like 2 years ago and I‚Äôm overwhelmed with how much shein has improved. I order at least once every month for the past years and I love my purchases each time. There used to be issues with delivery when they used to deliver through ARAMEX, but I can confess that for about a year now, delivery has been perfect and the products, awesome. I buy everything; kitchenware, bedspreads and sheets, shoes and bags, and then those clothing that I always love. I just can‚Äôt stop ordering; it‚Äôs very addictive and that‚Äôs solely because I am satisfied with what they deliver. Thank you SHEIN. I RECOMMEND YOU TO THE ENTIRE WORLD ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

title: Shein is the BEST
text: You guys, you can find just about anything when it comes to the beauty products they sell or any style of clothes! They have men‚Äôs, woman‚Äôs, unisex, and children‚Äôs clothing in all sizes. They also have a great selection of jewelry which I recently had shipped to my house. This app/website is very trustworthy and I have never had an issue with it. The prices are AMAZING and work great if you are trying to afford things while still saving money. There is also crafts such as paint and jewelry supply! I bought some of those as well and they work just as well as something you would buy from Walmart for $30. But Shein will sell it for just $10 or LESS! There are many more items in this app that you can buy as well. Overall, this app should work well for everyone and I hope everyone who uses this app enjoys it just like I do! <3

title: 100% Legit and at an affordable price.
text: SHEIN has so many adorable outfits! And at a cheap price! They sell anything. Clothes, jewelry, accessories, etc. SHEIN sells boys clothes as well so if you‚Äôre shopping for someone in your family that‚Äôs a boy this is a good app for you. They have cute clothes that give a expensive look but they really aren‚Äôt expensive. I really enjoy this. Oh and before I forget if you turn notifications on it gives you codes for sales or tells you when a sale goes on but it can overflow your phone with messages. One thing is when I was going to by something for the first time I wasn‚Äôt logged in. My shopping car was full. When I logged in it deleted everything and I had to find the items again. I don‚Äôt know if it was just me but just keep that in mind. Otherwise this is such a marvelous app! Definitely recommend.

title: Suspended for no reason and no help
text: Customer service absolutely sucked! D: I didn‚Äôt even realize my account was suddenly suspended until I was trying to buy some sweaters. I have had my account since high school(a decade) I have never done anything suspicious or malicious with my account but they suspended my account under those grounds with no evidence I did anything wrong. I sent an email with no response and tried talking to live chat and they just kept circling back saying ‚Äúoh we‚Äôll just shop somewhere else‚Äù after I was begging for help. Won‚Äôt use the app ever again obviously because I can‚Äôt but also I‚Äôve just never had this happen anywhere and to just be told to shop somewhere else is absolutely insane. The only thing I could think of is that I didn‚Äôt confirm an order got delivered in a timely fashion because I was sick and dealing with personal problems, I guess I didn‚Äôt have my priorities in order. Now I know I guess‚Ä¶ I wasn‚Äôt even trying to say I didn‚Äôt get it, it got here but medical issues are more important than confirming an order delivery

title: LOVE THIS COMPANY
text: I‚Äôve been a regular customer of SHEIN for almost a year now. I discovered SHEIN on a Facebook advertisement surprisingly. I was skeptical at first but decided to download the app and check it out, I‚Äôve loved it ever since!!! This is a great place to find cute, beautiful, and elegant looking clothing/outfits for such an affordable price!! There‚Äôs always coupons available and with the points system you can get extra savings!! Also the shipping time is pretty reasonable. Only once was my order delivered really late but it was not SHEINs fault. Although if you are a person who prefers to talk to a person as far as customer service, there is no phone number to call. I would say that‚Äôs the only downside. Everything I‚Äôve bought from SHEIN this year I‚Äôm always getting compliments on and asked where I got my outfit(or shoes, or purses) I actually like SHEIN a lot more than Fashion Nova. I highly recommend this app!!!!

title: Awesome site for affordable clothes, but could use some work on customer service
text: I love shopping this website for affordable clothing. I always buy a ton of stuff whenever I shop the app.  Their their customer service and areas of the website where you view your account info needs some work.  it‚Äôs not very user-friendly the way they have it set up.I found it confusing to try to find a return label and still have yet to manage to get a hold of anyone to actually talk to about a bathing suit that I only received half of paid for the whole thing obviously. It doesn‚Äôt explain what how theyll get back to you or when‚Ä¶And I make it kind of hard to find that page in general. The shopping is super easy love the clothes would like to see a more user-friendly website other than the shopping part or the other part and more user-friendly customer service availability

title: Love
text: So I wanna start by saying every store has its faults, but I love shein. I have only had trouble once, and the consumer service was great and fixed my problem so I only have good things to say. Now the sizing can be off, but they size chart is accurate to there clothing even though it may not be accurate to US sizing. So as long as you know your measurements and follow the size chart to match your measurements, let‚Äôs say you are a small, but the measurements for a particular item match size large, then buy large. The shipping is fast and cheap for being over seas, and comes with accurate tracking info. When you need help there is often wait times, but they always get to you, and I have never had a rude person. The clothes sometimes may have a couple wild threads, but for 4-15$ I don‚Äôt mind to cut a thread loose. All in all for the money, convince & costumer service it is a win. Happy costumer

title: Wishlist/Cart trouble/Help center troubleüò°üò°üò°

title: SHEIN IS MY BESTIE.
text: I live in Maui and there‚Äôs little to no good stores‚Ä¶ especially since I‚Äôm short and skinny. Nothing in my style comes in my size and even worse, some just aren‚Äôt even sold here. Soo i turn to online shopping for my wardrobe! Shein has helped me so much and not to mention all the coupons and codes it gives you FOR FREE. I swear i don‚Äôt ever have a problem using a coupon. And points are really great! I wish they‚Äôd change the points system because 1 point is about 1 cent‚Ä¶ so even tho i have 138 points i only get $1.30 off. And i wish i could use multiple coupons‚Ä¶ BUT they have all clothes for cheap and tons of sizes! Unfortunately I have to shop in the kids section bc those sizes fit me best‚Ä¶ (kids sizes can  fit an adult though‚Ä¶ keep that in mind). AND ALWAYS check the sizes. title: Great but has some annoying glitches
text: SHEIN is really great and comes in handy for cheap clothes, but there‚Äôs an update that groups your clothes into different groups. I went to go take one thing out of my cart and it completely deleted the entire section of clothes that I wanted. There‚Äôs also a short amount of false advertising in the pictures, they will have Asian sizes without any hint, so sometimes you literally have to order something two to three sizes bigger. There is also the problem of clearing out your entire cart randomly?? Idk why but when you go to check out for some clothes it will randomly clear out everything in your cart, even if you have it in your wishlist/favorites they will clear it all out. If you screenshot it and go to search for it again, even if it was clearly still in stock beforehand, they will act as if they don‚Äôt have it and show different variations of what you‚Äôre searching for, instead of the exact piece of clothing that you‚Äôre searching for.

title: My packages?
text:
In July, I ordered 3 items that cost 40$ and I didn‚Äôt sign up or anything. It charged me of course and I waited, and waited, and waited, but nothing ever came. So I tried to contact the company which was SO HARD. It is so hard to contact Shein which is a little odd to me. And I personally regret not signing in because I had no way of proving it except for my computer‚Äôs history, and when I pressed on the previous tab that my receipt was on of course it didn‚Äôt work. Shein has beautiful clothing, yes, but to have better customer service and for me to get my 3 hours of work back is a need, because now it‚Äôs December, and I haven't got not one package nor my money back. Please fix this.

My advice to you, is PLEASE sign up before you order anything, say you don‚Äôt receive it, now you have evidence to prove you ordered. And to be extra safe take a picture.

I‚Äôm a student and I ordered that off of my pay from a summer job. I clearly don‚Äôt have money to not be noticing things as such, so Shein, help me out here.

title: Unbelievable
text: It‚Äôs so unbelievable how amazing shein is IAbsolutely love them their clothes their shoes accessories jewelry everything don‚Äôt get me wrong I‚Äôve gotten a few things that might be questionable butThat can happen from anywhere all in all they are greatExample I kid you not I have a bout 40+ pairs of shoes and only one pairI receivedMade me unhappy one pair out of 40+ that‚Äôs amazing every piece of clothing I have gotten have been beautiful and great only problem I have had with them is small things like they don‚Äôt fit me which is my fault I got the wrong size or on some of the jeans the zippers are a littleCheap but for the price you can‚Äôt really complain I have washed them and I have worn them quite a few times and they haven‚Äôt broke I will shop here forever I‚Äôve gotten all my friends to like it I‚Äôve gotten my husband to love it my kids even my dogs LOL thank you shein

title: Awesome

title: Cute stuff but mostly meant for smaller people
text: There‚Äôs not as much options for plus size women, I‚Äôm a senior in high school and I see all of the popular and cute clothes are for people up to Large. The sales always have a bunch of options for smaller people, as soon as I put in 2xl in the filter, all the different things go away and there‚Äôs only one shirt that‚Äôs business casual every time, and it‚Äôs discouraging. Also majority of the plus size options are oversized shirts just for them to say plus size women are included me they don‚Äôt even fit right like they‚Äôre supposed to. It hurts  when I see my smaller friends be able to always be happy with their packages and I haven‚Äôt ever felt that once. I even make sure to have the right measurements for every single part of my body. SHEIN makes me feels bad about my body, because I can‚Äôt get the pretty things everyone else is getting. Leaving this on a good note most of the home decor is good enough to trust in.

title: My favorite but..
text:
Hi

So I absolutely love SHEIN it‚Äôs amazing, and I‚Äôm a bit, big. And I love looking in the petite section and I‚Äôm so sad that some of the clothes don‚Äôt come im larger sizes ( I‚Äôm 5‚Äô9 and 2XL) because I absolutely love some of the clothes that are in that section. My friends who got me into SHEIN are small, like really small, like, my friend had to put extra holes in her belt to make it fit her, kind of small. All of the clothes on SHEIN are beautiful, even when I look at the stuff I can‚Äôt wear, like petite clothes that don‚Äôt have any larger sizes, I still say, ‚ÄúOh my god that‚Äôs adorable!‚Äù I just wish that the size range was better, and I wish the belts where a better quality because I bought a few belts and they broke and the belt hole cover things to make it look nice, those fell off in two days of wearing it, and the belts started to rip after a week or so. 
Thanks for reading my ramble I hope the feedback helps you all!

title: I LOVE SHEIN!!!!!!
text:
I have not had a bad experience using shein, and everything i‚Äôve gotten has met my expectations. You can find stuff for a lot cheaper on here compared to other stores and you can trust that you will receive your items. If you don‚Äôt receive them, you can get a refund or have the items sent to you again free of cost. I‚Äôve never had this problem, but i‚Äôm happy to know the option is there. That is as long you don‚Äôt abuse it, which many people have done sadly. 

I do have one suggestion and that is to have a option to control what notifications you receive. I get a lot of notifications from shein throughout the day, a lot of which I don‚Äôt really care for. I would just like to receive notifications about things like a product that is back in stock or updates on my order.

title: Spent a ton of money and they did not send me my items
text: I bought about 7 items. They sent my box out to the warehouse and they made a label and pretty much just didn‚Äôt do anything else. It sat at the warehouse for WEEKS. They tried to say it was due to the corona virus, but I know that‚Äôs a lie because a package I ordered a week after this one had already shipped out and was almost to my house. I‚Äôm pretty sure they misplaced the package and they do not want to admit it. They aren‚Äôt sending me another package to fix the problem, and they also are extremely hard to get ahold of so to ask for my money back is almost nearly impossible. They don‚Äôt have an actual customer service, you talk to a computer instead of real people. So your answers don‚Äôt actually get answered. So I probably will never receive my items, nor will I get my money back. And I think one of the reasons they aren‚Äôt sending my items is because I accidentally clicked ‚Äúconfirm delivery‚Äù like the week after I ordered (I meant to click track) and they knew it wasn‚Äôt delivered, so they wanted to keep their merchandise PLUS my money. DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE!!!

title: losing points.
text: i order from shein CONSTANTLY, and i‚Äôve never really been disappointed with anything i‚Äôve gotten, i love all the fashionable clothing im able to obtain for cheap. but what im writing this review for is to complain about the daily check in points. i‚Äôve been collecting points for weeks and close to a month now, but have been saving in case i order again. one day i was doing my check in after not being on the app for a bit because i was on a trip and realized most of my points were GONE. i was never told that daily check in points expired, and i have been saving for quite a while. yeah its just a couple dollars, but you don‚Äôt get much points from check in. so whenever i was down a whole 2 dollars, i was infuriated because that took me WEEKS to get. please start disclosing this on the rules check in page, i‚Äôve checked and rechecked it and it doesn‚Äôt say anywhere that your points expire like your coupons do.

title: LOVE SHEIN!!!
text:
SHEIN has the cutest,up to date styles for every season clothes for women,plus sizes,men,even babies/children!!
 They also have other cute items like nails,makeup,shoes,accessories,etc. Can‚Äôt beat their prices,all low cost but good-great quality. And they are always giving away coupons,reward points to go towards ur total purchase to bring ur total down even with a  coupon applied towards ur final total purchase to bring ur final bill total lower as possible! Love love love SHEIN

title: I feel SCAMMED!
text: I was so excited to get my clothes that I spent over 120 dollars on for school. It said it would arrive in two packages. The first package has the correct items with two shirts and pants and some accessories. However, the second package was delivered RIPPED OPEN with only TWO other items which was a shirt and three rings. There were two other items in the package that I DID NOT order which was a cheap cartoon kids dress and a rainbow children‚Äôs jumper. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs from someone else‚Äôs order or why I was given that. I‚Äôm still missing EIGHT of my items. I tried to reach out to their customer service but it‚Äôs just a bot. I said that I received wrong/missing items and I either want a refund or to just have the rest of my items sent to me but their only response was that ‚Äúall items were in the parcel when it was shipped‚Äù WELL WHERE ARE THEY? I used to live shien but now I DO NOT trust them and will not shop there ever again. I used to tell my family and friends they should use it and now I strongly advise them not to. GIVE ME MY MONEY BACK OR MY CLOTHES!

title: Yes I know this is bad but listen
text: This app is a total life changer for me, I need various things and I mean NEED and unfortunately thrift stores have now matched the prices of literal Gucci products in my area. I also am aware of just how many companies are fast fashion or worse- and people use them because all they know about is SHEIN. But truth is if you‚Äôre using this app because you can‚Äôt afford anything else there‚Äôs a big difference than an influencer buying a ton of clothes to just return them and get put to landfill probably. Also any clothes I‚Äôve received from here are surprisingly very good quality. Not only are they not used, but they are affordable. I‚Äôve-gotten countless  sports wear from here, cute clothes, animal products, skin care, underwear products and more. Just if you use this app use your stuff- don‚Äôt let it go to waste is all.

title: I Love SHEIN
text:
I was in doubt when I first saw the app, but for the curiosity, I download the app and start browse through the app. Find a lot of nice clothes with very affordable price. I was still unsure when I placed my first order since I don‚Äôt know this app/brand/company. I decide to give a try because I really like the price and style they presented. 

I was impressed when I received my first order. Some of the clothes are thinner than I expected but not too bad. Some of the dresses are in really nice material and all of the clothes I bought are comfortable. Size fit in just right. One of the dress was too small because I accidentally chose the wrong size. Return is very easy and hassle free. 

I already placed three orders in two months. Love their sites:
1. Their clothes are very stylish and cheap
2. The return is easy and hassle free
3. The size fits right
4. Lot of products to choose

The buyer need to keep in mind is that you need to have reasonable expectation. You can‚Äôt expect to pay $10-$20 and receive $50-$100 products. I think their price is cheap compare to the Walmart, Ross etc. SHEIN is way better than them with cheaper price. I buy my casual or office clothes here and receive a lot of compliments due to stylish. You will pay at least half price you pay at store for same material.

title: Cheap and Unethical
text: The clothes from SHEIN are cheap and crudely made. After one wash they‚Äôve shrunk and/or start falling apart. Along with their cheap clothing there‚Äôs overwhelming evidence about how these clothing items are produced. This type of production is extremely bad for the environment, but even worse the people working in these factories are criminally underpaid along with working in sweatshop conditions. The prices make it so tempting to shop from here, but IT‚ÄôS NOT WORTH IT. They can respond to these reviews with their claims ‚Äúnothing has been proven‚Äù, but the evidence is out in the open and impossible to ignore. SHEIN also masks rewards on their shop by forcing people to give reviews, pictures, etc. for them. The more ‚Äúlikes‚Äù you get on a review, the more points you get towards and order. You see people begging for people to like their post because they want to be able to afford more clothing. It‚Äôs sad to look at. There are plenty of other stores to shop at that have better ethics, are better for the environment, and don‚Äôt take advantage of their customers. DON‚ÄôT SHOP AT SHEIN!!!!!

title: Wow! Inflation Hits SHEIN
text: I want to first say that when I first found SHEIN online, I thought the clothes were cute and prices were great. The quality of the clothing was surprisingly good despite the low prices. But as with everything else, the prices seem to have increased quite a bit. I realize that SHEIN has been under attack for allegedly treating its workers poorly and paying them substandard wages. If I knew prices increased due to improvement of SHEIN‚Äôs working conditions, then I wouldn‚Äôt mind paying more for their products.  But, if SHEIN has merely increased their prices just to pad their bottom line because they are a multi- billion dollar entity, that just seems greedy to me. Unless I see prices drop, I will be able to get at least the same or better bargains anywhere else. If that happens then SHEIN will lose its competitive edge and I will be able to shop anywhere and receive the same value for my money.

title: Shein is awesome !!
text: I love shein . I can say so many things abt this app , where do i start ?? . First off it‚Äôs so much fun to shop and look for clothes of any age and size ! . title: Never disappointed!!
text: I have ordered from Shein at least five times now and I have never been let down. I‚Äôve ordered a little bit of everything you can imagine - girls clothes, pajamas, swimsuits, jewelry, men‚Äôs clothes, shoes, socks, etc. - and I have always ended up loving what I received and what I paid for it. Not only are the items up to par, but I always receive them earlier than the shipping date predicts. Although, you do receive what you pay for in terms of quality in the jewelry, I have always been impressed by how cheap yet high-quality their clothes and swimsuits are. This sounds robot generated, but I promise I am just a frequent shopper and will continue to be in the future. I think my biggest win on this website is swimsuits and shoes, they‚Äôre so cheap yet so cute and high-quality! Highly recommend to all friends and family.

title: Middle school shein shopper
text: I am a daily shopper on shein. Anytime I need something I always go to shein. They always have the best things and succeed your expectations. I love their sets, bathing suits/bikinis, and jewelry. I especially love the summer items, from amazingly cute bikinis to gorgeous clothes! I am always placing a shein order once every two weeks! The only thing I would say is order ahead of time because it takes a little to come. Shein shipping usually takes one and a half weeks to the max two weeks! Shopping on shein has really helped me to express my style! As someone who is the style preppy they have many things that succeed that style! They also have many other things that shows many other different styles. Anytime someone asks me where I get my clothes from I will most likely say shein. Overall shein is the best place to shop!

title: Hit or miss
text: This site can be downright frustrating sometimes. If you ignore that the items are mostly made cheaply, that they sometimes aren‚Äôt anything like they are described, that the sizes are often times totally of the mark you are still stuck with a site that plays games with your money. Oh they aren‚Äôt that bad at taking your money and shipping items to you but God forbid you need to return something because getting your money back is like pulling teeth!! It takes them weeks to a month in order to even process a simply $30 return and honestly if the return is more than that then you should expect to wait nearly 2 months for the money back!! It‚Äôs just ridiculous!! And their online tech support is a stupid robot service that half the time can‚Äôt even help you with what you need! As much as I do find pieces I truly love, I wind up spending hundreds of dollars and hours of my time to find that 1 piece I do actually like! Starting to question the value of this app altogether!!!

title: Terrible- STOLE MONEY AND WILL NOT REFUND -Do No Use
text:
This is actually a zero star but can‚Äôt leave that
Someone hacked my account and added their phone number to the account and ordered over $600 worth of product. I canceled the orders right away but the money was still taken out of my account. Shein admitted they knew it was fraud (via instagram direct message which is the only place i have been able to reach someone) but they will not refund the money because it is ‚Äúpending complaint‚Äù (even though they said they knew it was fraud so i do not know what is still ‚Äúpending‚Äù) and they will not remove the fraudulent number and they will not allow me to delete the account. This was about a month ago and now they have stopped responding to me. So, they basically stole over $600 and will not deactivate my account while someone still has access and keeps adding stuff in the cart which i have to monitor and keep removing. (and the way for me to deactivate my account - they send a text message‚Ä¶.to the fraud number so they don‚Äôt click the link to deactivate)

title: Good quality

title: You get what you pay for
text: You realize this is a site of cheap clothing, good. So don‚Äôt get disappointed when something isn‚Äôt exactly what you thought it would be. title: Why 1 star you ask?
text: First of all I always buy things from shien and I never had an issue but today as I was trying to buy a jacket, a shirt and some earrings with a Visa card that I had gotten for my birthday, it had about 35 dollars and keep in mind I had already bought something with the card which was a diamond painting and a phone case which came out to be seven something so I still had like 28 dollars left in the card and so I had picked out everything I wanted and I was trying to purchase the things that I had wanted, it kept saying that the transaction didn‚Äôt want to go thru so then my sister called to see how much it had and it said that i had 45 cents left which was false because after the first purchase that I got I didn‚Äôt spend it on anything else, we thought that some one had used it or had taken a picture of the card so they could use it but as we called again to see what we last had bought, it was just saying the diamond painting and the phone case so now we are thinking that they scammed up and took the money cause that what they are known for. SO WATCH OUT!

title: Not Great
text: Last year for school I ordered some clothes from this app, and they were very mediocre. The sizes for the clothes were very off, and the material promised on the website was not at all proved to be true when I received my package. However, I did have some clothes that fit just right and even ordered a pair of sandals that were true to size. This year, I decided to order some shirts for school, BIG MISTAKE! On the app, it said to me that my order had been shipped but just a few hours ago , only one shirt out of the 7 I ordered came in ! I go to the website to check it out and it tells me my order is in CHINA. Keep in mind i‚Äôm supposed to have had my order by Monday, its Tuesday and they are just NOW telling me its in Hong Kong. The customer service is terrible! I received zero answers about why my order was delayed, and why my order is still at its origin place. They definitely need to invest in better shipping and a more efficient customer service so they can make sure their customers are satisfied with the order they spend their money on.

title: Not the ‚Äúwest it one and throw it away clothes‚Äù you thought

title: Amazingly bad with shipping
text: A few years ago I had done a few different purchases with SheIn, while the products were low quality,  I expected that from the price. It has gotten much worse since then. The last order I placed before this current one was in mid-2020 and it had no major issues. However, I guess shein has switched their warehousessince then?? To a much worse one apparently. I spent about $70 my first time being back on shein around march15th. I was contuously waiting for my package. The tracking number said it would delivered march 25-27. When that time had passed I contacted customer service on shein and they said it would be delivered April 3rd. Then April 3rd passed. As soon as I realized they were lying to me I demanded a refund which they gave me. Nonetheless, my package never came. It is now April 5th. My package tracking has still not updated since the 19th of March. Unfortunately I will never be shopping here again because although the process are what I can afford right now, I'm not going to risk another situation like this.

title: Very Satisfied 11/10.
text:
I‚Äôve had this app for about 3 years now and it hasn‚Äôt felled me not once. There‚Äôs a Mix between Female and male clothes, they sale kid and pet clothes, they have house decorations, makeup, and more. The best thing about all of this is that it‚Äôs Cheep yet really good quality. All the clothes are up to date in fashion, and they have lots of options and styles you can look at and purchase. They also give you coupons, and points for buying stuff and rating the clothes you buy, which is used to lower your price on your item/items when your checking out.
It‚Äôs very trustworthy, and your sure to get what you ordered in 2 weeks or earlier, but if you can you can always get express shipping which adds a little more to the price.

All being said I rate this clothes store 11/10 and would 100% recommend.

title: Lame
text: This app has some cute outfits for sure, but do your own research as to why they are able to have such low prices, fast international shipping and quality products. But thats not the issue I‚Äôm here to address. The app allows you to rate items you receive for pulpits to purchase more items. But unless you give them a 5 star review, your review gets hidden and no one ‚Äúlikes‚Äù your review no matter how thorough, and accurate your review is. I‚Äôve left them 3 Star reviews with LOTS of photos and details and sizes and everything and NO ONE has seen my reviews. I have to do a DEEP DIVE to find my review. Meanwhile, you have people with 5 star reviews that has NO PHOTO and very little details and they made it to the top. So they‚Äôre racking up points to buy more close for being dishonest while my honest reviews are getting buried. I could just play their game and give good reviews so I can have points to buy more clothes but I really don‚Äôt feel like folding and playing along with the game. DO BETTER.
